code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Slider from'react-slick';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import Modal from'./modal';import'../scripts_css/slider.css';import'slick-carousel/slick/slick.css';import'slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductSlider=_ref=>{let{products}=_ref;const[selectedProduct,setSelectedProduct]=useState(null);const settings={dots:true,infinite:true,speed:500,slidesToShow:5,slidesToScroll:1,swipeToSlide:true,arrows:false,responsive:[{breakpoint:480,settings:{slidesToShow:2}}]};const handleCardClick=product=>{setSelectedProduct(product);};const handleCloseModal=()=>{setSelectedProduct(null);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"SliderTitleDiv",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"SliderTitle",children:"Most Common Products"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{...settings,children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"LinktoProducts",onClick:()=>handleCardClick(product),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"StoreCards",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"SliderImage",src:product.ImgPath,alt:product.Name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.Name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",product.Price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"gotoproducts",to:"/products",children:"Go to Products"})]})},product.id))}),selectedProduct&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal,{product:selectedProduct,onClose:handleCloseModal})]});};export default ProductSlider;
